title: Felix Auger-Aliassime Is on a Roll
description: The Canadian tennis player at one point won 16 matches in a row. Now, he is headed to the Nitto ATP Finals.
dc:creator: Cindy Shmerler

media:content.media:description: Felix Auger-Aliassime celebrating last month in Basel, Switzerland, after defeating Holger Rune in a final. “That scream felt really good,” he said.
